name: postcss-vpx-to-vw

1.0.1.name: postcss-vpx-to-vw

1.1.0.name: postcss-vpx-to-vw

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run demo:validate && npm run lint && npm test

1.1.0.description: PostCSS plugin to convert vpx units to vw, maxvpx to max(vw, Npx) for minimum bounds, and minvpx to min(vw, Npx) for maximum bounds in responsive design
